title: Chaos

meta.inherit_fields: Goal: Eliminate all Order and Outsiders that directly oppose your goal.

desc:
Chaos is the bad faction of the game. They know each otherâ€™s identity, and share a persistent chat during the game. Chaos also has the following communal abilities:

1. Every Night phase, they may choose to deal 2 HP of unblockable damage to a player at the end of the phase.
2. Chaos also has X communal Disguises to use at the start of the game. *X = (# of Chaos members x2)*
3. Chaos also has Y communal Reforge! they may use. *Y = (# of Chaos members)*
